description.@value: There are so many different courgette muffin recipes readily available, mostly containing a lot of sugar and fats. Which to us in moderation they're ok! but I wanted to create a "healthier" alternative which taste just as indulgent and still has the sticky texture we just love from a chocolate cake. I hope you'll not be disappointed!! (makes 12 muffins)

ingredients.@value: 30g cocoa powder (the best quality you can find)

recipeInstructions.@value: Cook at 180oc for 20 mins, approx 30 mins for a large cake.
Simply mix all the ingredients in a large bowl until thoroughly combined and then scoop into muffin cases, or a lined cake tin if you prefer.
